pullrequest.title: Fix missing shadows and normal maps when using ogre 1.9

content.raw:
`#version 120` this is the problem here. Looks like ogre 1.9's RTShaderLib now doesn't work with this version 120. In ogre 1.9 they added a new folder with called GLSL150, that's where I took the glsl shaders from. 

I tested another solution - overwriting current rtshaderlib glsl files with newer versions. Gazebo with ogre 1.7.4 works but gave a bunch of warnings in ogre.log. So I decided that it's safe to have both versions for now..
